short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have fun with this game made to honor the World Cup in Brazil in 2014.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have fun with this game made to honor the World Cup in Brazil in 2014. The objective of the game is to control a ball (doing kick-ups) without letting it collide with obstacles. If the ball touches any obstacle or fall, the game ends. Make a point always to go through an obstacle.
